Detailed Description

template<class T1, std::size_t N>
class ForSyDe::DDE::unzipX< T1, N >

The unzipX process with a vector of outputs and one input.

This process "unzips" a signal of vector type into a vector of output signals.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class T1 , std::size_t N>
ForSyDe::DDE::unzipX< T1, N >::unzipX ( sc_module_name  _name)
inline

The constructor requires the module name.

It creates an SC_THREAD which reads data from its input port, zips them together and writes the results using the output port
